column4: On Lucid, is Grub bootup page supposed to be just a black screen with a list of options?
...or is it supposed to be themed?
it depends on if you're dualbooting or not
how do I enable the theme?
it doesn't say how to enable it...
you can remove those extra kernels from synaptic
i looked but I didn't see any extra kernals.
if you don't, then do sudo update-grub
here's the output: http://pastebin.org/220101  I think they're all still there
those should be in Synaptic, then
bastid_raZor, so based on that paste i just posted, I should sudo apt-get remove linux-image-2.6.32-(13,17,18,19,20, and 21)
yep, you can use tab-complete to help you as well
Thanks, I think that did the trick :)
cool, then update your grub, and all is good
